name: Kulfon Fighters
description:
Description:

A curse has fallen upon the land of peaceful creatures called Kulfons. Wave of negativity makes pits them against their friends. Take control of a chosen Kulfon and attack your friend when wave of negativity falls upon you and defend yourself when your friend is struggling with this curse. To successfully evade attacks you need to reverse moves of your opponent. But beware, there can only be one survivor.

Play with a friend in local multiplayer or try to survive as long as you can fighting always negative Kulfon in singleplayer mode.

In multiplayer mode you can play as either fire-breathing dinosaur or as a tree stump. Tough decision to make.

Instructions:

Attacking player (negative Kulfon) record their attacks during Fight phase.
Defending player needs to remeber opponent attacks and reverse them during Defend phase.
For example if attacker executes Up command, defender needs to execute down command. Otherwise he will get hit.
After Defend phase attacker and defender swaps their roles and attacker get one more attack than before.
Player who'll manage to K.O. opponent's Kulfon wins.

IMPORTANT NOTE:

WHENEVER PLAYERS HEAR AND/OR SEE "Get Ready!" COMMAND, THEY NEED TO PRESS SPACE TO ENTER NEXT PHASE.

Controls:

First player:
    Up -            W
    Down -          S
    Left -           A
    Right -          D
    Next Phase -     Space

Second player:
    Up -            up arrow
    Down -          down arrow
    Left -           left arrow
    Right -          right arrow
    Next Phase -     Space
